text: Agar aap inn say poochen kay aasman-o-zamin ko kiss ney peda kiya hai? To yaqeenan woh yehi jawab den gay kay Allah ney. Aap inn kahiyey acha yeh to batao jinhen tum Allah kay siwa pukartay ho agar Allah Taalaa mujhay nuksan phonchana chahye to kiya yeh uss kay nuksan ko hata saktay hain? Ya Allah Taalaa mujh per meharbani ka iradah keray to kiya yeh uss ki meharbani ko rok saktay hain? Aap keh den kay Allah mujhay kafi hai tawakkal kerney walay ussi per tawakkal kertay hain
